weka.dl4j.text.tokenization.tokenizer.preprocessor

Class StemmingPreprocessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.text.tokenization.tokenizer.preprocessor.CommonPreprocessor
      • weka.dl4j.text.tokenization.tokenizer.preprocessor.StemmingPreprocessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, org.deeplearning4j.text.tokenization.tokenizer.TokenPreProcess, OptionHandler

    public class StemmingPreprocessor
extends org.deeplearning4j.text.tokenization.tokenizer.preprocessor.CommonPreprocessor
implements java.io.Serializable, OptionHandler
    Implements basic cleaning inherited from CommonPreprocessor + does stemming using a Weka Stemmer.
    Author:
    Felipe Bravo-Marquez
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
